A chargeable service that is available to anyone who works with older people, including carers of people in receipt of individual budgets, who would like to purchase a tailored training package to help them support older people better. The training package is tailored to the individual needs of the group via support planning. Training packages can cover issues affecting older people, for example, dementia, mental health, professional boundaries etc. The bespoke training packages can be purchased as a single day or a series or training days to suit your needs. Please contact for further information.
